summary: Thunderbolts* is an upcoming Marvel superhero movie directed by Jake Schreier. The film stars Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, and David Harbour as a group of antiheroes who work for the government. It is the 36th movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) and is scheduled to be released in the US on May 2, 2025, ending Phase Five of the MCU. The film has gone through some changes during its development, with some actors leaving and being replaced due to production delays caused by labor disputes.
title: Thunderbolts
